amendment.description: Amendment sought to extend coverage of the bill to include commercial uses and development of U.S. lands by foreign companies and U.S. subsidiaries of foreign companies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that no federal official may nominate, classify, or designate any lands owned by the U.S. for special, commercial, or restricted use under any international agreement unless such nomination, classification, or designation is specifically authorized by law.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 182 (Roll no. 502).
